Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.25 Windows 32bit careermode

Problem: All Stadardexperiments have no GUI or no Options. For example: The 2Hot just have a Button "Toogle Display". The Mystery-Goo doesn't have any Kind of Button or Gui if i do a rightklick on it. Aditional are there some of the Squadpart twice in the VAB.

Link

Are there some known Bugs?

Reproduction steps:

Build a simple craft with some standard experiments, go to launchpad or in space and try to run them.

Log:

Output_log.txt

Edited November 16, 2014 by John_McBeth

This is a symptom of duplicate science experiment definitions.

Config(EXPERIMENT_DEFINITION) SCANsat/Resources/ScienceDefs/EXPERIMENT_DEFINITION
...
Config(EXPERIMENT_DEFINITION) SCANsat-master/SCANassets/Resources/ScienceDefs/EXPERIMENT_DEFINITION

You seem to have downloaded the SCANsat source archive and installed it alongside another (correct) copy of SCANsat. Remove that one (delete the entirety of SCANsat-master folder in GameData) unless you have a particular reason to have installed it

Thank you for your fast answer. I'll give it a try and let you know the results!

EDIT: It works! Thanks a lot!

Edited November 16, 2014 by John_McBeth
